page.title: 04A 12 YEAR OLDS DAY
page.content: I get up at about 7.15a.m.and have my breakfast which is usually toast and tea.Then I get washed and dressed,get my school bag ready and leave the house about 8.30.It takes about 15 minutes to get to school and as I don't start until 9a.m.I have time to play before going in.I usually play at Aunties and Uncles or skipping.When I go in I do mental and then maths.I have a break of 15 minutes to play at 10.30,I play at Red Letter or Chocolate Fudge.When I go in I do English work which is usually S.R.A,this is cards with stories and questions.I go for lunch at 12.15 for an hour.In the afternoon I do project work or arts and crafts.I go home at 3.15.do my homework and then I can play until about 5.30 when it is time for dinner.
